name: Rainbow Spiral
description:
A group of different adventurers find themselves thrown into a new dimension, where they must work together to find the cause of the disruption and return home!

An early prototype of the crossover game between Momo and meido! The Momei Doumei!

(Warning: many placeholders assets)

Since the game is currently unfinished, the R route content ends at Miseria and the Sappheira route ends shortly after encountering Akito. We greatly appreciate feedback and bug reports!
